name: Spooky Ghost (devJohn)
description:
As a newly formed ghost, you must escape from the cave!

Controls

Action button - Touchscreen, left mouse button, "Z" key, or controller face button (ex. Xbox's "A" button)

Fly - Tap or Hold the action button to fly. Release it to fall.

Story

You awaken to find yourself in a dark cavern. Suddenly you realize that you exist as a spirit rather than your original corporeal form.

Trying to adapt to your new mode of transport, you travel through the cave in hopes of finding a way out.

Will you find an escape, or something more sinister ahead?

Known Issues

Tabbing away from the game as it is in progress will cause the audio to continually loop until the game regains focus. You may need to refresh or leave the page to stop the audio.

Development Information

Created with Godot v3.4.4-stable. Image edits done using GIMP.

Created, in part, by following the tutorial by Kaan Alpar - 

I started becoming more comfortable with Godot during the process, and made some changes beforehand as I followed along, but I only followed the initial 50% as I had different concepts for how to implement some parts. I'd highly recommend his video, however.
